6 // Hidden serialization helpers
7 void serializeDirection(const Eigen::Vector3i& parent_direction,
8  uint32_t* data) {
9  CHECK_NOTNULL(data);
10  CHECK_EQ(*data, 0u);
11 
12  // NOTE: these checks will fail until the TODO below is adressed.
13  DCHECK_GE(parent_direction.x(), INT8_MIN);
14  DCHECK_LE(parent_direction.x(), INT8_MAX);
15 
16  DCHECK_GE(parent_direction.y(), INT8_MIN);
17  DCHECK_LE(parent_direction.y(), INT8_MAX);
18 
19  DCHECK_GE(parent_direction.z(), INT8_MIN);
20  DCHECK_LE(parent_direction.z(), INT8_MAX);
21 
22  // TODO(helenol, mfehr):
23  // Serialization should never change the values, the parent values will either
24  // need to be truncated in the ESDF integrator or we need to use more bytes to
25  // serialize the ESDF voxel.
26  const int8_t parent_direction_x =
27  std::min(INT8_MAX, std::max(parent_direction.x(), INT8_MIN));
28  const int8_t parent_direction_y =
29  std::min(INT8_MAX, std::max(parent_direction.y(), INT8_MIN));
30  const int8_t parent_direction_z =
31  std::min(INT8_MAX, std::max(parent_direction.z(), INT8_MIN));
32 
33  // Layout:
34  // | 3x8bit (int8_t) for parent (X,Y,Z) | 8bit ESDF |
35 
36  *data |= static_cast<uint32_t>(static_cast<int8_t>(parent_direction_x) << 24);
37  *data |= static_cast<uint32_t>(static_cast<int8_t>(parent_direction_y) << 16);
38  *data |= static_cast<uint32_t>(static_cast<int8_t>(parent_direction_z) << 8);
39 }
40 
41 Eigen::Vector3i deserializeDirection(const uint32_t data) {
42  // Layout:
43  // | 3x8bit (int8_t) for parent (X,Y,Z) | 8bit ESDF |
44 
45  Eigen::Vector3i parent_direction;
46 
47  parent_direction.x() = static_cast<int8_t>((data >> 24) & 0x000000FF);
48  parent_direction.y() = static_cast<int8_t>((data >> 16) & 0x000000FF);
49  parent_direction.z() = static_cast<int8_t>((data >> 8) & 0x000000FF);
50 
51  DCHECK_GE(parent_direction.x(), INT8_MIN);
52  DCHECK_LE(parent_direction.x(), INT8_MAX);
53 
54  DCHECK_GE(parent_direction.y(), INT8_MIN);
55  DCHECK_LE(parent_direction.y(), INT8_MAX);
56 
57  DCHECK_GE(parent_direction.z(), INT8_MIN);
58  DCHECK_LE(parent_direction.z(), INT8_MAX);
59 
60  return parent_direction;
61 }

63 // Deserialization functions:
64 template <>
65 void Block<TsdfVoxel>::deserializeFromIntegers(
66  const std::vector<uint32_t>& data) {
67  constexpr size_t kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel = 3u;
68  const size_t num_data_packets = data.size();
69  CHECK_EQ(num_voxels_ * kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel, num_data_packets);
70  for (size_t voxel_idx = 0u, data_idx = 0u;
71  voxel_idx < num_voxels_ && data_idx < num_data_packets;
72  ++voxel_idx, data_idx += kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel) {
73  const uint32_t bytes_1 = data[data_idx];
74  const uint32_t bytes_2 = data[data_idx + 1u];
75  const uint32_t bytes_3 = data[data_idx + 2u];
76 
77  TsdfVoxel& voxel = voxels_[voxel_idx];
78 
79  // TODO(mfehr, helenol): find a better way to do this!
80 
81  memcpy(&(voxel.distance), &bytes_1, sizeof(bytes_1));
82  memcpy(&(voxel.weight), &bytes_2, sizeof(bytes_2));
83 
84  voxel.color.r = static_cast<uint8_t>(bytes_3 >> 24);
85  voxel.color.g = static_cast<uint8_t>((bytes_3 & 0x00FF0000) >> 16);
86  voxel.color.b = static_cast<uint8_t>((bytes_3 & 0x0000FF00) >> 8);
87  voxel.color.a = static_cast<uint8_t>(bytes_3 & 0x000000FF);
88  }
89 }
90 
91 template <>
92 void Block<OccupancyVoxel>::deserializeFromIntegers(
93  const std::vector<uint32_t>& data) {
94  constexpr size_t kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel = 2u;
95  const size_t num_data_packets = data.size();
96  CHECK_EQ(num_voxels_ * kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel, num_data_packets);
97  for (size_t voxel_idx = 0u, data_idx = 0u;
98  voxel_idx < num_voxels_ && data_idx < num_data_packets;
99  ++voxel_idx, data_idx += kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel) {
100  const uint32_t bytes_1 = data[data_idx];
101  const uint32_t bytes_2 = data[data_idx + 1u];
102 
103  OccupancyVoxel& voxel = voxels_[voxel_idx];
104 
105  memcpy(&(voxel.probability_log), &bytes_1, sizeof(bytes_1));
106  voxel.observed = static_cast<bool>(bytes_2 & 0x000000FF);
107  }
108 }
109 
110 template <>
111 void Block<EsdfVoxel>::deserializeFromIntegers(
112  const std::vector<uint32_t>& data) {
113  constexpr size_t kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel = 2u;
114  const size_t num_data_packets = data.size();
115  CHECK_EQ(num_voxels_ * kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel, num_data_packets);
116  for (size_t voxel_idx = 0u, data_idx = 0u;
117  voxel_idx < num_voxels_ && data_idx < num_data_packets;
118  ++voxel_idx, data_idx += kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel) {
119  // Layout:
120  // | 32 bit sdf | 3x8bit (int8_t) parent | 8 bit flags|
121 
122  const uint32_t bytes_1 = data[data_idx];
123  const uint32_t bytes_2 = data[data_idx + 1u];
124 
125  EsdfVoxel& voxel = voxels_[voxel_idx];
126 
127  memcpy(&(voxel.distance), &bytes_1, sizeof(bytes_1));
128 
129  voxel.observed = static_cast<bool>(bytes_2 & 0x00000001);
130  voxel.hallucinated = static_cast<bool>((bytes_2 & 0x00000002));
131  voxel.in_queue = static_cast<bool>((bytes_2 & 0x00000004));
132  voxel.fixed = static_cast<bool>((bytes_2 & 0x00000008));
133 
134  voxel.parent = deserializeDirection(bytes_2);
135  }
136 }

138 template <>
139 void Block<IntensityVoxel>::deserializeFromIntegers(
140  const std::vector<uint32_t>& data) {
141  constexpr size_t kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel = 2u;
142  const size_t num_data_packets = data.size();
143  CHECK_EQ(num_voxels_ * kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel, num_data_packets);
144  for (size_t voxel_idx = 0u, data_idx = 0u;
145  voxel_idx < num_voxels_ && data_idx < num_data_packets;
146  ++voxel_idx, data_idx += kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel) {
147  const uint32_t bytes_1 = data[data_idx];
148  const uint32_t bytes_2 = data[data_idx + 1u];
149 
150  IntensityVoxel& voxel = voxels_[voxel_idx];
151 
152  memcpy(&(voxel.intensity), &bytes_1, sizeof(bytes_1));
153  memcpy(&(voxel.weight), &bytes_2, sizeof(bytes_2));
154  }
155 }

157 // Serialization functions:
158 template <>
159 void Block<TsdfVoxel>::serializeToIntegers(std::vector<uint32_t>* data) const {
160  CHECK_NOTNULL(data);
161  constexpr size_t kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel = 3u;
162  data->clear();
163  data->reserve(num_voxels_ * kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel);
164  for (size_t voxel_idx = 0u; voxel_idx < num_voxels_; ++voxel_idx) {
165  const TsdfVoxel& voxel = voxels_[voxel_idx];
166 
167  // TODO(mfehr, helenol): find a better way to do this!
168  const uint32_t* bytes_1_ptr =
169  reinterpret_cast<const uint32_t*>(&voxel.distance);
170  data->push_back(*bytes_1_ptr);
171 
172  const uint32_t* bytes_2_ptr =
173  reinterpret_cast<const uint32_t*>(&voxel.weight);
174  data->push_back(*bytes_2_ptr);
175 
176  data->push_back(static_cast<uint32_t>(voxel.color.a) |
177  (static_cast<uint32_t>(voxel.color.b) << 8) |
178  (static_cast<uint32_t>(voxel.color.g) << 16) |
179  (static_cast<uint32_t>(voxel.color.r) << 24));
180  }
181  CHECK_EQ(num_voxels_ * kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel, data->size());
182 }
183 
184 template <>
185 void Block<OccupancyVoxel>::serializeToIntegers(
186  std::vector<uint32_t>* data) const {
187  CHECK_NOTNULL(data);
188  constexpr size_t kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel = 2u;
189  data->clear();
190  data->reserve(num_voxels_ * kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel);
191  for (size_t voxel_idx = 0u; voxel_idx < num_voxels_; ++voxel_idx) {
192  const OccupancyVoxel& voxel = voxels_[voxel_idx];
193 
194  const uint32_t* bytes_1_ptr =
195  reinterpret_cast<const uint32_t*>(&voxel.probability_log);
196  data->push_back(*bytes_1_ptr);
197  data->push_back(static_cast<uint32_t>(voxel.observed));
198  }
199  CHECK_EQ(num_voxels_ * kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel, data->size());
200 }
201 
202 template <>
203 void Block<EsdfVoxel>::serializeToIntegers(std::vector<uint32_t>* data) const {
204  CHECK_NOTNULL(data);
205  constexpr size_t kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel = 2u;
206  data->clear();
207  data->reserve(num_voxels_ * kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel);
208  for (size_t voxel_idx = 0u; voxel_idx < num_voxels_; ++voxel_idx) {
209  const EsdfVoxel& voxel = voxels_[voxel_idx];
210 
211  // Current Layout:
212  // | 32 bit sdf | 3x8bit (int8_t) parent | 8 bit flags|
213 
214  const uint32_t* bytes_1_ptr =
215  reinterpret_cast<const uint32_t*>(&voxel.distance);
216  data->push_back(*bytes_1_ptr);
217 
218  uint32_t bytes_2 = 0u;
219  serializeDirection(voxel.parent, &bytes_2);
220 
221  uint8_t flag_byte = 0b00000000;
222  flag_byte |= static_cast<uint8_t>(voxel.observed ? 0b00000001 : 0b00000000);
223  flag_byte |=
224  static_cast<uint8_t>(voxel.hallucinated ? 0b00000010 : 0b00000000);
225  flag_byte |= static_cast<uint8_t>(voxel.in_queue ? 0b00000100 : 0b00000000);
226  flag_byte |= static_cast<uint8_t>(voxel.fixed ? 0b00001000 : 0b00000000);
227 
228  bytes_2 |= static_cast<uint32_t>(flag_byte) & 0x000000FF;
229 
230  data->push_back(bytes_2);
231  }
232  CHECK_EQ(num_voxels_ * kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel, data->size());
233 }
234 
235 template <>
236 void Block<IntensityVoxel>::serializeToIntegers(
237  std::vector<uint32_t>* data) const {
238  CHECK_NOTNULL(data);
239  constexpr size_t kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel = 2u;
240  data->clear();
241  data->reserve(num_voxels_ * kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel);
242  for (size_t voxel_idx = 0u; voxel_idx < num_voxels_; ++voxel_idx) {
243  const IntensityVoxel& voxel = voxels_[voxel_idx];
244 
245  const uint32_t* bytes_1_ptr =
246  reinterpret_cast<const uint32_t*>(&voxel.intensity);
247  data->push_back(*bytes_1_ptr);
248 
249  const uint32_t* bytes_2_ptr =
250  reinterpret_cast<const uint32_t*>(&voxel.weight);
251  data->push_back(*bytes_2_ptr);
252  }
253  CHECK_EQ(num_voxels_ * kNumDataPacketsPerVoxel, data->size());
254 }
